name: Space Trucker
description: Set in the future of a Cold War that never ended, Space Trucker is a FPS that takes you on a journey that spans the galaxy. You play as Vladimir Gagarin, a young russian who just wants to go home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core or Higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Family DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Additional Notes: .NET Framework 4.5
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 4770k or AMD FX-8350 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 560 Ti or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Additional Notes: .NET Framework 4.5
